Title: Pimento
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Thomas Schnauz, Gordon Smith (staff writer)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: Chuck wants to transfer the Sandpiper case to HHM much to Jimmy's dismay. Mike gets a job offer working as a bodyguard.
